title: CBC Radio
text:
Bruce Springsteen is known for his rock anthems with heart. His lyrics are full of references to working hard, trying to make ends meet, pushing back against bullies and fighting to make your way in the world. Now, a new film out by writer-director Gurinder Chadha looks at the impact Springsteen's music can have on people.

Blinded By The Light is the true story of how a British-Pakistani teenager found solace, inspiration and a kindred spirit in Springsteen. Chadha joined q guest host Ali Hassan to tell us more about the film.

Chadha's new film Blinded by the Light is in theatres now.

Download our podcast or click 'Listen' near the top of this page to hear the full conversation with Gurinder Chadha.

— Produced by Ben Jamieson
